pkgmetadata.longdescription: > # PASTEBIN API```# Module made by @venaxyt on Githubimport pastebinapiusername = "pastebin account username"password = "pastebin account password"api_key = "account api_key findable here https://pastebin.com/doc_api# Check an accountpastebinapi.check(username, password, api_key)>>> Output : [username] Valid account# Get the token of an accountpastebinapi.token(username, password, api_key)>>> Output : [username] Token : account token# Upload a paste on an accountprivacity = "2" # 0 : public | 1 : unlisted | 2 : privatecontent = "That's my text"title = "Venax paste"pastebinapi.paste(username, password, api_key, privacity, title, content)>>> Output : [>] Successfully uploaded :>>> Output : [>] Pastebin text page : https://pastebin.com/pasteid>>> Output : [>] Pastebin text /raw : https://pastebin.com/raw/pasteid```> ### **Download** : ``pip install pastebinapi``
